string-array.name: body
string-array.item: Everyone starts drinking until the person who draw the card stopped.
Place your thumb\non the table.\nLast to do so, drinks!
Everyone reach for the sky with both hands.\nLast player drinks!
Choose a partner and drinks whenever the player drinks!
Nobody can make\neye contact with you.\nIf caught, drink!
Choose a category.\nSay something that fits until whoever can\'t think of any, drink!
Complete the sentence,\n "Never have I ever.." \nAnyone who has, drink!

Ask a player a question.
They must respond with another question to the next person.

First to fail, drink!
Set a new rule.\nFill the King\'s Cup!

string-array.name: guide
string-array.item:
Yes, this a drinking game.
Doesn't has to be alcoholic.

Everyone have your own drinking cup and place a cup in the middle to be the King's Cup.

Pick a person to start the game, select a card and do what it says.

There is no escape!
Pass to the next person when you are done.

Draw a King from the deck,
you can choose any drinks to pour into the King's Cup.

Person with the last King will have to finish the cup in one shot!
Cheers mate.
